name: Summer Camper Van Truck Simulator & Car Parking 3D
name_original: Summer Camper Van Truck Simulator & Car Parking 3D
description:
It’s summer vacation time! Remember uphill dangerous roads? Well those don’t exist anymore! Experience the thrill of driving summer camper truck on smooth roads around sunny beach. Drive cruiser car, attach with camper truck trailer and complete summer driving and parking missions.

Let’s start greatest summer adventure while driving modern camper van of 2017. Drive minibuses, offroad jeeps and camper trailer through caravans around crowded campsites and dense forests. Select your favorite cruiser car, attach with camper truck trailer, and drive around tropical beaches. Drive hover car trailer without crashing into traffic cars and obstacles. Caper the magnificent view of blue sea as you pass through vertigo-inducing oceanside routes. The game features beautiful sunny spots which make driving around city a true pleasure. Realistic outdoor environments, detailed minibus vehicles and complex interiors will make you feel like driving a real rv caravan. Get on board and drive camper van to complete all the routes with precision driving.

Key Features:
Spectacular gameplay in car trailer driving missions
Drive multiple vehicles: cruiser jeep, RV caravan, camper truck
Detailed camper trailer models with real time physics
Dynamic traffic to drive in outdoor environment
Advanced turbo engine designed for big vehicles
Realistic 3D graphics with amazing sound effects

Enjoy the unique gameplay and give your feedback to help us improve our games in future releases.
